TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_paris, title = paris, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/paris} }

S.FORM: aicu a paris(vurangse a kai:Paris；ciniukukan:巴黎)avan ca sangasangasan a lizuk katua tjaljavavavan a sihu a kaizuanan i pinaljavakan nua se vurangse. avan uta aza a vecekadan a kaizuanan patjara sikudakudan. au aicu a paris a hici kaimaza i pinu i 法蘭西島大區 a tjaljaveqeveqan a paris 省 nua aya. avan sika tucu aicu a kadjunangan nua se paris a vecekadan mavan a i taladj tua sicuyan a upu a paris (izua aza tjaqacavan a djalan palingulj i sasaw tua paris a lizuk a kadjunangan). saka nu pasusu tua aicu cinalivatan a pinaljavakan nua se paris izuanga 20 a cy, inika maumalj kemasi 1860 a cavilj patje tucu. au patje 2018 a caviljan, izua paselaw tu 215 a kudravan a taqaljaqaljan imaza. izua kimaya 1,300 a kudravan a caucau uta imaza i paris a lizuk a kadjunangan a penuljat (巴黎都會區 nua aya) mavan ita tjaljaqacavan a hici nua i iyurupu (歐洲 nua aya). ka tjaisangas kimaya 1,000 a cavilj tuazua, aza paris avan nu tjaljaqacavan a hici imaza i europe, avan uta tjalja sangasan a hici i kacauan (kemasi 1500 a cavilj patje 1900 a cavilj). au tucu avan a sinan pazangal a vecekadan patjara sinkiw katua bunka i kacauan, izua mareka ikiw parutua sinupuan, kivangavang, situcunan a lalangan, keci a saliman, iga, pinapebulay a paridiu katua siubay a maretimalji a sengsengsan i kacauan. izua aza pacugan na qivu tu New York, London, Tokyo, Hong Kong katua paris avan ca lima a tjaljaqaca a hici i kacauan sicuayan siayaya. lja izua mareka kinateveteveljan nasa kaigugu a umaq nalemingdjelj imaza i paris, izua kinateveteveljan a 聯合國教科文組織, kinateveteveljan a 經濟合作與發展組織, kinateveteveljan a 國際商會 katua kinateveteveljan a 巴黎俱樂部. paris avan a tjalja nanguaq a kadjunangan patjara temalem mareka cemel katua kasiw nua i europe avan sika na sedjeljep tu caucau a kivaljutan imaza, saka tauta tjalja pazangalan a sisikac imaza a hici nua i kacauan. imaza i paris katua vurangse a qacavan a cy (法蘭西島大區nua aya) matja drusa a kadjunangan nakinipaysu izua 1/4 a sipavay ta kuka. izua tu 5,521 a laulavan a europe a paysu ka 2009 a caviljan tuazua. saka izua 33 a tjaljapazangal sa tjaljapungadanan a kuba na lemingdjelj ta umaq sedjelj a imaza i La Défense a kadjunangan. au izua tjaliaw a sinupuan a kikang namatevetevelj imaza. izua kimaya 4,200 a kudravan a caucau nakivangvang a semamaza lemita a cavilj, avan sika paris namasan tjaljatjuruvuan a taqaljaqalja a hici i kacauan. tucu izua 3,800 a kunian a sauzayan katua sepatj a sauzayan nasekacauan. ka 1989 a caviljan paris napapungadan tua "bunka a hici" i europe. ka 2014 a caviljan tuazua paris avan a sikamasan tjeljulj a hici i kacauan. ngadan cinalivatan kadjunangan caucau sikacu kilalaing takakudan sikakudan drikiki a umaq pakatua tjaqacavan a drikiki a umaq avan nu Opéra garnier a umaq katua Opéra bastille a umaq, aicu a Opéra garnier na lemingdjelj anga ka 1875 a caviljan. au izuanga matja drusa a drikiki a umaq tuazua ka 1850 a cavilj, mavan ljaicu a Opera Comique(法國喜歌劇院 nua aya) katua Théâtre Lyrique(國家歌劇院 nua aya). izua tjuruvu a kisansemenay na semenay imaza, parutua Maurice Chevalier, Georges Brassens, Charles Aznavour katua Édith Piaf. ljemita a cavilj izua mareka palisian i paris, parutua seman taliduan pinaka 塞納河搖滾節 nua aya. iga izua liaw a iga nua se paris sinan pazangal i kacauan, lja izua tjuruvu a seman iga a caucau na mumalj anga taicu a iga nua se paris, parutua Jean-Luc Godard, Claude Lelouch, François Roland Truffaut, Claude Chabrol katua Luc Besson. izua tjuruvu a igakang paqaqarut i maza i paris, lja mareka zazianan katua ung-gaku a umaq na pavalitan tua igakang ka 1930 a cavilj a patagilj. izua tjuruvu a iga na pasasing manu temaucikel tua milimilingan pakamaza, parutua"midnight in paris"se Woody Allen ,"Moulin Rouge"se Baz Luhrmann,"The Da Vinci Code" se Ron Howard katua "Amélie"se Jean-Pierre Jeunet. au izua aza zuga a iga pinaka"Ratatouille"se Pixar Animation Studios a kuba, a milimilingan itua patarevan na pacacapilj tua paris a kadjunangan. remayurangan kemasi 1848 a caviljan, paris namasan tua vecekadan itua punuljat a kisiya a djalan nua se vurangse. patje 1889 a caviljan tuazua aza vatjuljayan a papukakeljanganan (巴黎鐵塔 nua aya) naqemacuvung anga imaza itua palisian pinaka 世界博覽會 nua aya, aicu a vurangse namasan tua papungadan a kunian i kacauan. ljemita cavilj izua kimaya 2,800 a kudravan a qaljaqalja na kivangavang imaza i vecekadan a hici (au imaza i paris a lizuk izua kimaya 4,200 a kudravan a qaljaqalja), izua sedjelj a 1,700 a kudravan a caucau kemasi gaikuku, avan sika paris namasan tua hici izua tjatjuruvuan a caucau namangtjez a remayurangan. manu a niamdju kinatjengelayan a kadjunangan avan nu saseqetjan ta paridiu a sicuacuayan a nanemanga umaq katua kipaqentjan a umaq. sa ljemita cavilj izua paselaw tu 800 a kudravan a caucau semamaza i louvre a umaq, ui angata tu masan tua sangasangasan a sicuacuayan a nanemanga a umaq izua tjaljatjuruvuan a qaljaqalja na semekez imaza. au pakatua kiukay imaza, aza Notre-Dame de Paris a kiukay katua Sacré-Cœur a kiukay ljaicu a matjadrusa a kiukay izua tu 1,200 a kudravan katua 800 a kudravan a caucau semamaza ljemita cavilj. sa pakatua vatjuljayan a papukakeljanganan, izua paselaw tu 600 a kudravan a caucau ljemita cavilj, kemasi lemingedjeljan patje tucu izuanga drusa a laulavan mangetjez imaza. sa aicu a kivangvangan pinaka Disneyland izua paselaw tu 1,450 a kudravan a caucau ljemita cavilj. au izua a umaq pinaka Versailles imaza i pasakaledep a navalj nua paris, kemasi 1682 a caviljan patje 1789 a caviljan, avan nu kamakama a umaq, au ka 1979 a caviljan napiniliq tua bunka a sauzayan se kacauan. undu siljizavan i lizuk umaq sinupuan siakai sipacacikelan == mareqali i gaikuku ==

aico a paris(vorangse a kai:Paris；ciniokokan:巴黎)avan ca sangasangasan a lizok katoa tjaljavavavan a siho a kaizoanan i pinaljavakan noa se vorangse. avan ota aza a vecekadan a kaizoanan patjara sikodakodan. ao aico a paris a hici kaimaza i pino i 法蘭西島大區 a tjaljaveqeveqan a paris 省 noa aya. avan sika toco aico a kadjonangan noa se paris a vecekadan mavan a i taladj toa sicoyan a opo a paris (izoa aza tjaqacavan a djalan palingolj i sasaw toa paris a lizok a kadjonangan). saka no pasoso toa aico cinalivatan a pinaljavakan noa se paris izoanga 20 a cy, inika maomalj kemasi 1860 a cavilj patje toco. ao patje 2018 a caviljan, izoa paselaw to 215 a kodravan a taqaljaqaljan imaza. izoa kimaya 1,300 a kodravan a caocao ota imaza i paris a lizok a kadjonangan a penoljat (巴黎都會區 noa aya) mavan ita tjaljaqacavan a hici noa i iyoropo (歐洲 noa aya). ka tjaisangas kimaya 1,000 a cavilj toazoa, aza paris avan no tjaljaqacavan a hici imaza i eorope, avan ota tjalja sangasan a hici i kacaoan (kemasi 1500 a cavilj patje 1900 a cavilj). ao toco avan a sinan pazangal a vecekadan patjara sinkiw katoa bonka i kacaoan, izoa mareka ikiw parotoa sinopoan, kivangavang, sitoconan a lalangan, keci a saliman, iga, pinapebolay a paridio katoa siobay a maretimalji a sengsengsan i kacaoan. izoa aza pacogan na qivo to New York, London, Tokyo, Hong Kong katoa paris avan ca lima a tjaljaqaca a hici i kacaoan sicoayan siayaya. lja izoa mareka kinateveteveljan nasa kaigogo a omaq nalemingdjelj imaza i paris, izoa kinateveteveljan a 聯合國教科文組織, kinateveteveljan a 經濟合作與發展組織, kinateveteveljan a 國際商會 katoa kinateveteveljan a 巴黎俱樂部. paris avan a tjalja nangoaq a kadjonangan patjara temalem mareka cemel katoa kasiw noa i eorope avan sika na sedjeljep to caocao a kivaljotan imaza, saka taota tjalja pazangalan a sisikac imaza a hici noa i kacaoan. imaza i paris katoa vorangse a qacavan a cy (法蘭西島大區noa aya) matja drosa a kadjonangan nakinipayso izoa 1/4 a sipavay ta koka. izoa to 5,521 a laolavan a eorope a payso ka 2009 a caviljan toazoa. saka izoa 33 a tjaljapazangal sa tjaljapongadanan a koba na lemingdjelj ta omaq sedjelj a imaza i La Défense a kadjonangan. ao izoa tjaliaw a sinopoan a kikang namatevetevelj imaza. izoa kimaya 4,200 a kodravan a caocao nakivangvang a semamaza lemita a cavilj, avan sika paris namasan tjaljatjorovoan a taqaljaqalja a hici i kacaoan. toco izoa 3,800 a konian a saozayan katoa sepatj a saozayan nasekacaoan. ka 1989 a caviljan paris napapongadan toa "bonka a hici" i eorope. ka 2014 a caviljan toazoa paris avan a sikamasan tjeljolj a hici i kacaoan. ngadan cinalivatan kadjonangan caocao sikaco kilalaing takakodan sikakodan drikiki a omaq pakatoa tjaqacavan a drikiki a omaq avan no Opéra garnier a omaq katoa Opéra bastille a omaq, aico a Opéra garnier na lemingdjelj anga ka 1875 a caviljan. ao izoanga matja drosa a drikiki a omaq toazoa ka 1850 a cavilj, mavan ljaico a Opera Comiqoe(法國喜歌劇院 noa aya) katoa Théâtre Lyriqoe(國家歌劇院 noa aya). izoa tjorovo a kisansemenay na semenay imaza, parotoa Maorice Chevalier, Georges Brassens, Charles Aznavoor katoa Édith Piaf. ljemita a cavilj izoa mareka palisian i paris, parotoa seman talidoan pinaka 塞納河搖滾節 noa aya. iga izoa liaw a iga noa se paris sinan pazangal i kacaoan, lja izoa tjorovo a seman iga a caocao na momalj anga taico a iga noa se paris, parotoa Jean-Loc Godard, Claode Lelooch, François Roland Troffaot, Claode Chabrol katoa Loc Besson. izoa tjorovo a igakang paqaqarot i maza i paris, lja mareka zazianan katoa ong-gako a omaq na pavalitan toa igakang ka 1930 a cavilj a patagilj. izoa tjorovo a iga na pasasing mano temaocikel toa milimilingan pakamaza, parotoa"midnight in paris"se Woody Allen ,"Moolin Rooge"se Baz Lohrmann,"The Da Vinci Code" se Ron Howard katoa "Amélie"se Jean-Pierre Jeonet. ao izoa aza zoga a iga pinaka"Ratatooille"se Pixar Animation Stodios a koba, a milimilingan itoa patarevan na pacacapilj toa paris a kadjonangan. remayorangan kemasi 1848 a caviljan, paris namasan toa vecekadan itoa ponoljat a kisiya a djalan noa se vorangse. patje 1889 a caviljan toazoa aza vatjoljayan a papokakeljanganan (巴黎鐵塔 noa aya) naqemacovong anga imaza itoa palisian pinaka 世界博覽會 noa aya, aico a vorangse namasan toa papongadan a konian i kacaoan. ljemita cavilj izoa kimaya 2,800 a kodravan a qaljaqalja na kivangavang imaza i vecekadan a hici (ao imaza i paris a lizok izoa kimaya 4,200 a kodravan a qaljaqalja), izoa sedjelj a 1,700 a kodravan a caocao kemasi gaikoko, avan sika paris namasan toa hici izoa tjatjorovoan a caocao namangtjez a remayorangan. mano a niamdjo kinatjengelayan a kadjonangan avan no saseqetjan ta paridio a sicoacoayan a nanemanga omaq katoa kipaqentjan a omaq. sa ljemita cavilj izoa paselaw to 800 a kodravan a caocao semamaza i loovre a omaq, oi angata to masan toa sangasangasan a sicoacoayan a nanemanga a omaq izoa tjaljatjorovoan a qaljaqalja na semekez imaza. ao pakatoa kiokay imaza, aza Notre-Dame de Paris a kiokay katoa Sacré-Cœor a kiokay ljaico a matjadrosa a kiokay izoa to 1,200 a kodravan katoa 800 a kodravan a caocao semamaza ljemita cavilj. sa pakatoa vatjoljayan a papokakeljanganan, izoa paselaw to 600 a kodravan a caocao ljemita cavilj, kemasi lemingedjeljan patje toco izoanga drosa a laolavan mangetjez imaza. sa aico a kivangvangan pinaka Disneyland izoa paselaw to 1,450 a kodravan a caocao ljemita cavilj. ao izoa a omaq pinaka Versailles imaza i pasakaledep a navalj noa paris, kemasi 1682 a caviljan patje 1789 a caviljan, avan no kamakama a omaq, ao ka 1979 a caviljan napiniliq toa bonka a saozayan se kacaoan. ondo siljizavan i lizok omaq sinopoan siakai sipacacikelan == mareqali i gaikoko ==
